UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antifungal In Vitro Activity of Pilosulin- and Ponericin-Like Peptides from the Giant Ant Dinoponera quadriceps and Synergistic Effects with Antimycotic Drugs.
Literature.Author: Dodou Lima HV, de Paula Cavalcante CS, Rádis-Baptista G

Literature.Title: The dinoponeratoxin peptides from the giant ant Dinoponera quadriceps display in vitro antitrypanosomal activity.
Literature.Author: Lima DB, Mello CP, Bandeira ICJ, Pessoa Bezerra de Menezes RRP, Sampaio TL, Falcao CB, Morlighem JRL, Rádis-Baptista G, Martins AMC

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:49.5% Hemolysis=20 µM,Monkey kidney epithelial cells LLC-MK2:50% Cell death=>100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 90029(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=20µM),Candida tropicalis ATCC 13803(MIC=20µM),Candida tropicalis ATCC 750(no activity data),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 90018(no activity data),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 40038(no activity data),Candida krusei ATCC 40095(no activity data),Candida krusei ATCC 40147(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=80µM),Candida tropicalis ATCC 13803(MIC=80µM),Candida albicans CA1(no activity data),Trypanosoma cruzi Y(no activity data),Trypanosoma cruzi Y(IC50=34.8±5µM)
